title: i still have not received the lunar revel "lunar revel coins" icon.
body: is it normal or should i submit a ticket?

replies.body: Don't worry, the goodies are still on the way.  We aim to have lunar revel icons distributed within 2 weeks after the event ends.  There are a lot of eligible players, so you may see some get it before others.  Hang tight!
two weeks have passed since the event ended and i still have not received it :/
